Class ValidatorContext<E>

java.lang.Object
org.example.validation.ValidatorContext<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of entity to be validated
public class ValidatorContext<E> extends Object
Context for applying a validation strategy to entities. Encapsulates a ValidationStrategy and delegates validation calls to it.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ValidatorContext(ValidationStrategy<E> validationStrategy)
    Constructs a ValidatorContext with the specified validation strategy.

    • validate

      public void validate(E entity) throws ValidationException
      Validates the given entity using the current validation strategy.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to validate
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if the entity is invalid according to the strategy
